text: If you go to Actions in the top right, you can convert to an automated email if you started with a regular one
That's fantastic Patrick, just what I was looking for! Thank you :slightly_smiling_face:

Hi. We're just coming over from Campaign Monitor and I'm trying to replicate some email templates we created using CM's very basic editor.  I need to have an automated email send a message that contains the month, current date, and year. In CM I can do that using <currentmonthname>, <currentday>, <currentyear>. I've looked in HubSpot forums but am not finding a way to do this. Anyone know the solution? It should be there somewhere, I'v never used an ESP that didn't provide that basic option.

Does this work?

```{% now "%A, %B %d, %Y", tz="America/Los_Angeles" %}```

Change your timezone to suit - Full list can be found here ->
